name: UTrust for software testing Services
description: UTrust is software testing services provider with 25 years of experience in testing and quality field, 350 QA Engineers (Egyptian, Indian and Ukraine) and most of our clients are centered in Middle east – in the Egypt, Qatar, UAE, Lebanon, Kuwait, Saudi Arabia, Jordan and Oman – but our capabilities can extend far beyond.

locations.address: 2 Gamal El Din Dewidar St., Omar Lotfy St., Nasr City
